= Introduction =

{{{
SET ANDROID_NDK_HOME=%[opt]\android-ndk-r7b
}}}

{{{
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.generation2</groupId>
        <artifactId>android-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <goals>
          <goal>ndk-build</goal>
        </goals>
        <configuration>
          <ndk>
            <path>${env.ANDROID_NDK_HOME}</path>
          </ndk>
        </configuration>
        <extensions>true</extensions>
      </plugin>
}}}

{{{
mvn com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.generation2:android-maven-plugin:ndk-build
}}}
